entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -25.7°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -25.7°C

Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
